text: [In] Mohi harom [soli haftumi hicri, ki imkoni umra guzoridan jofted] dar ʙaroʙari mohi harom [-i soli guzasta] ast [ki musrikon sumoro az adoi hac ʙozdosta ʙudand] va [tacovuzi] hurmatho [-i sarzaminu mohi harom] qasos dorad; pas, har ki sitam kard, ʙa hamon guna ki ʙar sumo sitam kardaast, ʙar u sitam ravo dored va az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va ʙidoned, ki Alloh taolo ʙo parhezkoron ast
